Emeka Ogboh (a mụrụ n'afọ 1977) bụ onye Naijiria na-emeputa ụda nke a maara nke ọma maka ụda ndụ ya na Lagos
N'ịbụ onye a zụrụ azụ dị ka onye na-ese ihe, ọ malitere ịrụ ọrụ n'ihe gbasara ụda ndị na-egosipụta obodo na-agbaso usoro ihe omume nka multimedia nke Ijipt
Ọ na-egosi ihe ndekọ na-enweghị mgbanwe site na ndụ obodo Lagos - dịka ọmụmaatụ, danfo ya na-ekerịta usoro tagzi - na ntinye gallery na ekwe ntị na ndị ọkà okwu
Ọrụ ya na-abụghị nke ọdịyo na-eji ihe osise sitere na ndụ obodo Lagos
O sonyere na DAAD Artists-in-Berlin Program na 2015 Venice Biennale, ma nata 2016 Bremen Böttcherstraße Art Award
Ọrụ ya bu nke egosipụtara na Brooklyn Museum, American National Museum of African Art, Menil Collection, Casino Luxembourg, na Kiasma
Ndị nkatọ kwuru maka ọgba aghara na mgbagwoju anya nke ụda ya, na ilekwasị anya na ịmegharị kama ịgbanwe ụda obodo ahụ.
A mụrụ Ogboh na Enugu, Nigeria, na Mee 14, 1977
Ọ gụrụ ihe osise na Mahadum nke Nigeria, Nsukka, ma gụsịa akwụkwọ na 2001
Ọ bi na Lagos, Nigeria, na Berlin.
Ogboh bụ onye na-emeputa ụda na vidiyo
Ọ malitere inwe mmasị na nka ụda n'oge klas mgbasa ozi na 2008 Fayoum Winter Academy ya na onye Austrian multimedia artist Harald Scherz
N'ịgbaso ahụmịhe a, Ogboh lebara anya na mmekọrịta nke ụda na Lagos dị ka nhazi kama olu nke onye ọ bụla
Ogboh jiri ụda ahụ tụnyere symphonies ndị otu egwu, na olu dị iche iche kama mkpọtụ ọgba aghara
O nwekwara ekele maka ikike ụda ahụ iji "na-ebugharị onye na-ege ntị" ma chọpụta ụda ahụ kachasị mma
Ọrụ ụda Ogboh enyochaala okwu a na-anụ nke na-egosipụta obodo, ọkachasị na Lagos, ebe ọ bi, na-arụ ọrụ, ma nwee mmetụta site na ọsọ ọsọ na enweghị atụ nke obodo ahụ
O kwuru na ụda olu siri ike nke obodo ahụ na-eme ka ndị ọbịa niile na-eme ka ha maa jijiji
OkayAfrica dere na ọrụ ya "juputara na nkọwa gbasara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị"

N'ụzọ dị otú a, ọkụ e were n'oge egwuregwu 2014 FIFA World Cup nke Naijiria abụghị ìgwè mmadụ na-ewe iwe kama ọ bụ "nkọwa na-akwụwa aka ọtọ banyere ndokwa gọọmentị nke ihe onwunwe." Ogboh ewerewo ihe ndekọ Lagos ndị a gaa n'ụlọ ihe ngosi dị na gburugburu ụwa kemgbe 2008.

O dekọrọ Lagos na mbụ maka iji ya mee ihe n'ime studiyo, mana mgbe e nyere ya echiche nke ịkekọrịta ụda maka ntinye nka, ọ malitere idezi ihe nkiri maka nnọchi anya ha kachasị mma nke Lagos ma were ya dị ka usoro kachasị mma nke mgbasa ozi ọha na eze
Site na mmemme nka ya nke Ijipt, Ogboh sitere na mkpali wee mepụta ọrụ Lagos Soundscapes mgbe onye na-ese ihe nwere ike ịmata ụda obodo ya n'oge oku ekwentị ya na enyi ya
Ka ọ na-agafe n'ọhịa, ọ tụgharịrị gaa n'enyemaka n'ịntanetị na mkparịta ụka na email
Na ntinye ya, Ogboh na-ahọrọ ụda nke chọrọ obere njikwa studiyo, ma ghara ịgbanwe ụda ahụ nke ukwuu
Ụfọdụ mmetụta ọdịyo sitere na gburugburu ebe obibi ndekọ, ma ihu abụọ nke na-agbagọ ụda, na mmetụta nke ịga njem na-edekọ ihe
Ntinye ụda mbụ ya bụ na ụlọ ịsa ahụ nke ụlọ ịsa ahụ nke ụlọ akwụkwọ Fayoum, sochiri ntinye mbụ ya nke ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ Ogboh chetara nnabata kachasị na ọrụ ọhụrụ ya.
A na-etinyekarị ọrụ ndị ahụ n'ụlọ ebe a na-ege ntị na ekwe ntị, ọ bụ ezie na a na-etinyekwa ha n'okporo ámá ọha na eze nke Cologne na Helsinki dị ka nkọwa banyere ijikọ ụwa ọnụ
Lagos by Bus ya bụ ndekọ nke ndị njem Lagos na-eme njem na danfo na-ekerịta tagzi na obere ụgbọ ala molue nke obodo ahụ iji rụọ ọrụ
Onye na-ere ahịa na-ekpe ekpere tupu ọ na-ere ndị na-agba ya ọgwụ, dịka abụ mkpesa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke Fela Kuti na-egwu na redio
E gosipụtara ntinye nkeji iri anọ na Cologne's Rautenstrauch-Joest Museum na 2010, e sere ụlọ ntu ahụ odo odo na akara ojii na mpempe akwụkwọ iji ṅomie akara ngosi nke danfo
Ntinye n'èzí na Ọbá Akwụkwọ Ọha nke Cologne mere ka okporo ámá nke Lagos gaa na nke Cologne
Ntinye yiri nke ahụ mere na ihe ngosi nka nke Kiasma nke Helsinki
Ogboh kwadoro intanetị nke Lagos Soundscapes ya na mmekorita ya na Goethe Institut Lagos maka July 2013 World Listening Day
N'ime ntinye Houston na Menil Collection, Ogboh tinyere bọs danfo, nke ọ na-eji dị ka 'agora' na-akpaghị aka nke na-ebu ọdịbendị dị ka akara ngosi nke Lagos
O mekwara vidiyo -Fractal Scapes - dị ka ihe osise " 'ihe osise 'oge' nke obodo ahụ,  wee malite imekọ ihe ọnụ na ndị egwu na-ezo aka na ndekọ Ogboh na Lagos.
N'afọ 2014, e gosipụtara The Ambivalence nke 1960 na ihe ngosi na Casino Luxembourg
Akụkụ a bụ nkeji isii nke okwu sitere na ememe nnwere onwe nke Naịjirịa n'afọ 1960, gụnyere nke Onye isi ala Nnamdi Azikiwe, Prime Minista Sir Abubakar Tafawa Balewa, na Princess Alexandra nke Kent
Ọchịchọ ha maka ikike mmadụ, nnwere onwe, nnabata okpukpe, na mmepe akụ na ụba, ma e jiri ya tụnyere nke ugbu a, na-egosi ọdịda ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naịjirịa n'ime ọkara narị afọ gara aga
Ogboh gara New York City na Septemba 2014 na danfo share, ihe nnọchianya nke njem ọha na eze na Lagos, maka ntinye otu ụbọchị (Lagos State of Mind II) na The Africa Center na Harlem
Ntinye ahụ gụnyere foto nke tagzi ahụ nwere akara akụkọ ihe mere eme na agbata obi ndị Afrịka na Amerịka na New York City, juxtaposed megide ụda dị n'ime na n'èzí tagzi ahụ
Otu n'ime ọrụ mbụ Ogboh, Verbal Maps of Ojuelegba, gosipụtara onye ọkwọ ụgbọala Lagos danfo na-agụpụta ụzọ Ojuelegba
Onye na-ese ihe kwuru otú e si machibido ịzụ ahịa n'okporo ụzọ ọhụrụ nke Lagos nakwa na tagzi danfo ga-emesị laa n'iyi, tinyere onyinye ha na ụda obodo ahụ
Ihe akụkọ ihe mere eme a abụghị ihe mbụ a tụlere na ọrụ ahụ, ọ bụ ezie na onye na-ese ihe mere atụmatụ maka ọrụ ya n'ọdịnihu iji kọọ mgbanwe nke obodo ahụ.

Ogboh sonyere n'ihe ngosi aha nke 2015 Venice Biennale, All the World's Futures, na The Song of the Germans (Deutschlandlied), otu ihe ngosi nke ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ Afrịka bụrụ abụ mba Germany n'asụsụ mbụ ha
O sonyere na 2014 DAAD Artists-in-Berlin Program ma gosipụta ya n'obodo ahụ
Ogboh meriri 2016 Bremen Böttcherstraße Art Award maka ntinye ya na Kunsthalle Bremen

Akụkụ ahụ, The Continental Entrée, na-ezo aka na mgbasa ozi nke ndị na-ere nri n'okporo ámá na European Union dị ka ebe ndị mbịarambịa Afrịka na-aga na akara neon nke na-agụ, "FOOD IS R€ADY." Mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, Ogboh gosipụtara na Brooklyn Museum's "Disguise: Masks and Global African Art" na United States National Museum of African Art

Na nke mbụ, o gosipụtara ntinye ụda nke afọ 2015, Egwutronica, nke egwu Igbo remixed, na nke ikpeazụ, ụda nkeji iri abụọ na asatọ ya nke Balogun Market (nke akpọrọ Market Symphony) bụ ihe ngosi nka mbụ nke ụlọ ihe mgbe ochie ahụ
A na-akpọ ụda ya site na ndị ọkà okwu etinyere na trays enamel a pịrị apị, otu ihe ahụ eji egosipụta ngwongwo n'ahịa
Na ngwụsị afọ 2016, e debere ọrụ ya na Julius Nyerere Peace and Security Building nke African Union na Addis Ababa
E debere ọrụ Ogboh The Way Earthly Things Are Going na Tate Modern n'afọ 2017. N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, edepụtara ya maka 2018 Hugo Boss Prize.
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2019, ntinye saịtị nke akpọrọ Ámà: The Gathering Place malitere na Cleveland Museum of Art

Ntinye ahụ, nke nwere ụda olu na nnukwu osisi a kpụrụ akpụ nke e kpuchiri ákwà, bụ iji kpalie ndụ kwa ụbọchị n'ime obodo ndị Igbo. Na Septemba, 2020, mgbe emechiri ọtụtụ ebe nka na Berlin n'ihi ọrịa Covid-19, a kpọrọ Ogboh ka ọ sonye na ọrụ ngosi a na-akpọ Studio Berlin, nke dị na ụlọ oriri na nkwari abalị a ma ama Berghain na Berlin.
Galerie Imane Farès nọchitere anya Ogboh ugbu a, mgbe ọ nọrọ ogologo oge dị ka "onye na-ese ihe na-enweghị onye nnọchi anya ya".

Ọkọ akụkọ ihe mere eme na onye nlekọta Ugochukwu-Smooth Nzewi kọwara ọrụ Ogboh dị ka ijide "ihe na-ewe iwe nke Lagos." Ogboh so na ndị Nzewi na-atụ anya ya na 2014 contemporary African art festival 1:54
N'afọ 2013, Ogboh kọrọ nnabata nke Lagos Soundscapes ya dị ka agwakọta: na-akpasu ụfọdụ iwe ma na-adọrọ mmasị ndị ọzọ
Obodo ndị dị jụụ na Europe ewerewo ọrụ ahụ dị ka "na-eme mkpọtụ ma na-enweghị isi", n'otu oge na-ebibi ọkà okwu ma na-akpọ ndị uwe ojii na ntinye ahụ
Onye na-ese ihe nwere ekele maka mmetụta ntinye ahụ na ndị Naijiria nọ na mba ofesi, na otú ịnọ na ntị nke ụda ahụ si gbagwojuru ha anya na gburugburu ebe obibi ha na mba ọzọ

Onye na-akọ akụkọ ihe mere eme Carol Magee kwuru otú ọbụna na azụmahịa nke Lagos Soundscapes, ọ na-enwe mmetụta nke uche ya lekwasịrị anya na usoro ndị ahụ na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe agbanwe n'agbanyeghị ụda nke ebe ahụ

Onye na-ese ihe nkiri nke Malawi bụ Massa Lemu kọwara ọrụ Ogboh dị ka nke na-egosipụta Afropolitanism, nke obodo ndị Africa na-anọchite anya ụwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike, nke zuru ụwa zuru ụwa ọnụ na ọtụtụ ọdịbendị ya dị n'otu ebe
Lemu chere na ụda Ogboh dị ka "ala ndị na-ege ntị" nke na-emegharị echiche nke gburugburu ebe obibi Lagos
O jikwa omume Ogboh tụnyere nke ndị na-ese ụda James Webb (South Africa) na Magdi Mostafa (Egypt), ọ bụ ezie na ha abụọ na-ejikarị ihe ndekọ ha eme ihe ebe Ogboh na-emegharị ihe mbụ

N'ihi nke a, Lemu lere ọrụ Ogboh anya dị ka nke dị nso n'usoro ọmụmụ na ụda John Cage chọtara karịa omume nke El Anatsui ma ọ bụ Romuald Hazoume recycling found objects as commentary on economic conditions.
